Description

A mixture model is a powerful framework commonly used to estimate the probability density function (PDF) of a random variable. Let us consider a mixture model of size . The probability density function evaluated at is given by

where denotes the weight of the mixture component such as . The MixtureModel class provides a convenient way to create and manage mixture of exponential families.
